website_summaries.verdict: A solid contender for a quality Edison style bulb that offers ambient lighting.
pros: This bulb stands out for its attractive, soft lighting that gives off a warm yellow glow
Users praise the beautiful soft lighting and statement-making appearance of these bulbs
We like that you don't have to purchase multiple bulbs
cons: A few felt the level of light was actually too low, so it's best for those who don't want an area brightly lit
Occasional users reported receiving broken bulbs

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN JUNK IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK. Listen to the one star reviews like I should have. Bought three bulbs, all three arrived broken, non working in the box. Amazon shipping box was fine, individual bulb boxes were fine, everything padded and bubble wrapped well. But every bulb inside the boxes had broken glass and broken filaments. THIS IS JUST CHEAP CHINA JUNK and a waste of your time. I can see some worker over there saying let's see how far we can dropkick this box of bulbs and laughing at the thought of someone over here then getting the glass shards.
customer_reviews.author: D. F.

customer_reviews.title: Edison Bulbs: Beautiful Warm Lighting...No Shade needed !
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs are so beautiful.....a dim light compared to regular bulbs, however, I'm legally blind and I see better in dim light. A warm amber makes the entire room beautifully cozy. No need for a lamp shade ! These look wonderful all by themselves. No wonder they're so popular ! I highly recommond them. Make sure you get "Edison", not copy cats... Remember, they light is on the dim side....so buy 60W if you want it a little brighter :)
customer_reviews.author: KarenTCB

customer_reviews.title: Welcome back to the Industrial Age!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this Edison bulb with a Perfectshow Retro light and I have to say I was very pleased with how this looks aesthetically together. Of course being only 40W, this won't illuminate much space, but you are buying this type of bulb for the aesthetics rather than efficiency. It emits a warm orange light that really accents wood tables or desks, so that was an added bonus I had not anticipated when purchasing this. If you are looking at Edison bulbs, than you obviously have something in mind in regards to how you want to use it. Buy it and you'll have quite a throwback experience!
customer_reviews.author: The 3am Impulse Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs were shockingly packaged in very flimsy individual styrofoam bulb boxes and a plastic cover that was the thinness of a plastic grocery bag. I purchased 10 bulbs and at least half arrived broken with loose interior filaments. Very disappointed. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 seconds of run time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered just one bulb for a lamp, looked to make sure wattage and voltage was all correct, it the bulb, installed it, ran for about 5 seconds and broke internally, I've never had a bulb like this do that, I run other bulbs like this outside without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nyseth

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Beautiful Glow.
customer_reviews.text: Since I moved furniture around, I ended up with a dark corner and I chose one of those cage type lamps for the area. The only lightbulb I considered was the Vintage Edison bulb to compliment the lamp. I wanted to purchase 6 at one time, but they were out of stock, so I settled for one. Beautiful, soft light with those amazing gold colored stripes of light. This is a lightbulb that is meant to be shown! I will get more since they are warm and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: beautiful authentic lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: I needed just the right bulb to go with a recent purchase of a small light fixture that is above my kitchen sink. I put in a regular light bulb and it was fine. However when I saw this Edison bulb...my thoughts said I think this will make my fixture stand out. It most certainly did and gives out an adequate amount of light that I needed. So happy I decided to browse the bulb selections! Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: S. Woolard

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware- check refund policy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken & can't get replacement apparently. Very disappointed. Ordered one previously and was very happy with it. Wanted to get a second one and now have to start over with new bulbs completely.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anita

customer_reviews.title: Don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them one was busted open, It was made of plastic, the other one turned on and blew in 4 seconds and it was made out of glass. I returned them and got two more one of those blew as soon as I turned it on. Stay away, I know some people have hade good luck with these but it’s not worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: very dim
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item in the same box as a lamp, and have had various conflicting messages about whether or not they got it. They tried charging me for it again, I had to go to the Credit Card company to get it resolved!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Bulb of Warmth
customer_reviews.text: No, this bulb will. not warm you up during the wintertime. Its rich, reassuring vintage glow is a favorable brightness of illumination. It is a single bulb purchase well packaged for that little lamp waiting for it. The product looks good even when it is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Broken bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Product would have been very nice if half the bulbs hadn’t arrived shattered into tiny pieces. Unfortunately, we couldn’t return them and are skeptical to order more after reading the reviews about inconsistencies in the products they send. We should have just spent the extra little bit and bought them from a home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: Davos Vannucci

customer_reviews.title: Way to dim
customer_reviews.text: Is not 40W. Very dim. More like a night lite. Not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Odd Choice to Use Heat-Sensitive Glue in a Heat Source
customer_reviews.text: Provides a good amount of light. Beautiful style. But the glass part of the lightbulb separated from its base after about 3 months of use. It appears to have melted off. Manufacturer needs to use a heat-resistant glue to securely seal the glass bulb to its base.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Neat look
customer_reviews.text: I really like the light bulbs and it has a really neat look. My only problem is I ordered two and they were both broke so I ordered two more and one of the two were broke so out of four I got one that works and I love it! it's just a packaging error. Also I was refunded so I didn't have a problem with that.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: super awesome as long as it's delivered unbroken
customer_reviews.text: i see all the complaints are delivery and as long as you get it unbroken I can guarantee you'll be happy with the product. it seems a bit fragile. only one broken piece of item during my move. But.. who moves bulbs frequently..?
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Cool bulb, leans to one side.
customer_reviews.text: The bulb is cool and I like the size. The part you screw in was not set properly, though, so my bulb leans to one side. Still, pretty cool, just looks wonky in my lamp.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: No return or replace even if it arrived broken?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and says no option to return or replace? Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cassetty-Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought along with an Edison light and has worked great after a few months. Won’t light up a whole room but is a nice accent or supplement light. We used it in a corner with our reading table/chair. No complaints and like that it can brighten or dim.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Received two of these today. One of them came broken. We LOVE the look of them and they’re great for the price, but, can’t appreciate that if it’s broken.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hull

customer_reviews.title: Opened box AND broken bulb:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was recommended with the antique lamp that is sold from another company (which also came damaged), and I am highly disappointed. The box the bulb came in arrived already opened so I was nervous. I plugged it into several different lights to see if it was my lamp, or the bulb itself that wasn't working. If you look closely in the picture, one of the strings in the bulb is sticking out. I'm upset because I was buying this as a birthday gift and now I have to figure something else out. Overall, not worth the money or the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Jade♡

customer_reviews.title: Bulb blew out after 1 second
customer_reviews.text: The bulb fizzled for about 1 second and then blew out. Luckily Amazon was kind enough to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: dandelion

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.return not available.
customer_reviews.text: The filament was broken up in arrival. I was never able to use it.Return option was not available. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So fibbing cool. Everyone loves my home's lighting and I only use these in my lamps. I have a steam punk style den and these add character and are a major talking point. They don't give off a ton of light, so if you're thinking of doing your workshop in these you may not be satisfied. Extremely cool, long lasting, pretty large too!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan the Dude

customer_reviews.title: Glass is amber tinted.
customer_reviews.text: This is amber colored like the photo suggests. Photos can be deceiving so I read through Q&A before ordering and someone had assured it was clear.. but it's not. It's still a good looking light, but it should be in the description somewhere that the glass is tinted.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice  design
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bulb, it looks awesome in my new pendant lamp!, My only issue so far is that even at 60 watts its kinda dim, but it IS an Amber bulb, and not a white one... which enhances the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: SkettinButter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dim Glow
customer_reviews.text: Since working from home I had to buy a desk. The only place for said desk is in the corner, with my back to the windows. Video calls were difficult. I purchased this bulb to go with a new lamp and it is PERFECT. Not to bright, not to dim.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanna

customer_reviews.title: Half came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to go with my new light fixtures. I just unpacked them and 1 of them came broken. I’m disappointed because I had an electrician here today to put everything up and now they have to come back again to put up the fixture since I need a new bulb. Disappointed it came broken although it is a cool light.
customer_reviews.author: Maquillaje by Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the heat
customer_reviews.text: It is not capable of lighting up your room. It is more for a romantic setting where you don't want to see your companion clearly. However, you want to keep things away from it since it generates a surprising amount of heat on its surface. I have to decide to replace it with LED light bulb at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: If you're the brooding and mysterious type (read: glorified homebody), I would highly recommend these bulbs. Compared to your standard fluorescent bulb that emits a blinding and warm light, a 40W Edison bulb emits a mellow, almost sepia light that will barely light the room. This is the perfect amount of light for navigating your turn-of-the-century studio apartment in the midst of a mid-grade scotch stupor. Some might call it "mood lighting" as well, but who are we kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. One came with broken filament the other was actually broken. However these lightbulbs are very pretty. I’ve just never seen one lit.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful amber light but dim
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but very dim lighting I purchase to go and a farmhouse side light that hangs above my kitchen sink it has a very beautiful look to it but the lighting is definitely an Ambered and dim
customer_reviews.author: destiny everett

customer_reviews.title: ... time I purchased this bulb it was tinted just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased this bulb it was tinted just like the picture, the second bulb I purchased from the same seller was in a different box and has clear glass and on to of that it does not even light up.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Took a month to get and arrived broken. Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: garage girl

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. This it a three way light. It’s not real bright. Perfect for a bedroom light or a mood setter for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Nylle

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: It's an Edison bulb, what more is there to say. It's about aesthetics more than functionality. Not very bright but gives off the warm (yellowish/orange) light I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: JustinEi

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bulbs for a while now! They last a long time. Look nice, but are on the dimmer side. That’s the look I wanted so I’m happy with that
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for setting the mood in our industrial style space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for setting the mood in our industrial style space, with its warm and dimmed glow, like a candle. We absolutely love it. Great for cozy evenings around the fireplace or for watching TV. this Edison light is a complementary mood light only. When we need additional lighting, we switch on our task lights and our recessed ceiling lights.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Zivick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light!
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong after running since October. It is a dim light so if it is going to be the only light in a space you may want to reconsider. However, as a secondary light this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a piece of art.
customer_reviews.text: Who would have ever wanted to show off their lightbulbs? These bulbs make a statement, don't hide them with a shade. Price is reasonable and delivery time is fair. There are so many uses, I am going back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs! I've had mine for about three weeks and it's still holding up great! I ended up purchasing three more- I searched high and low and could not find anything I genuinely liked and decently priced, this is a serious bang for your buck! Load up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Q.

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty but wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product was broken when received. The bulb looked fine, but would not light when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Marcelain

customer_reviews.title: Received totally smashed
customer_reviews.text: It looks great if you receive it not totally smashed :(( ordered two items, and one is destroyed during delivery. And the most sad thing is that I can't return it!!
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia Rogovets

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb
customer_reviews.text: The glass is clear, not the amber color as pictured. It is a warm amber color when on and pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Hasixy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for.....
customer_reviews.text: The color in the picture is deceiving, these are NOT amber colored like it shows, they are a clear bulb. Of my 4, 1 was shattered when I got it and shipping was very slow. All of that being said, they look nice in the lamp I put them in but I will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: AUDRA S RORICK

customer_reviews.title: Dim but exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: light bulbs have been in for a couple months. still works great. very dim but thats how I like them. I light up the front of my home with them and they give off a nice glow with not to much blinding lite. I think they are perfect for outside for people who usually do not turn on lights because how bright they are, these are Dim. would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This bulb burned out after being used for 15 minutes. JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D

customer_reviews.title: no illumination at all
customer_reviews.text: more of a night light. has no illumination at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it, except the buzzing. It's a high pitched buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OLD FASHIONED BRIGHTNESS
customer_reviews.text: I've had the light bulbs for about a month and they're working out great. Brighter than I expected but I like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Debi K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Update: The bulb lasted just for little over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh Pokharel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very yellowish light (as expected), the old-school filament look is so cool. It's hard to explain, but I have a lamp that is kind of open so you can see the light bulb and it looks awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased the lamp that requires this overpriced bulb! Not sarcasm...totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of these light bulbs arrived broken, yet it is unable to be returned!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bruun

customer_reviews.title: It's interesting, but less light than was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Looks interesting, but doesn't seem to give off very much light for a 40W bulb. Still, I think it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JPear

customer_reviews.title: excessive noise
customer_reviews.text: I had the same light bulb before I dropped it on the floor while cleaning. Ordered a new one. After turning it on, I've noticed that it makes an excessive noise which kind of bothers when I do my reading at night. Not sure if it's the specific bulb that I've received or they're manufacturing like this after all.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful with Industrial wrought iron metal steampunk table lamp. Yahah
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it Around 2 years ago and still works. It’s a soft yellow light. Very calming glow. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: It's like the energizer bunny of light bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago... It's still going strong! I know I've had it over a year now. It's on all night long and shut off during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: and it provides a nice soft light
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s a light bulb, and it does light bulb stuff. I have it on my desk at home, and it provides a nice soft light. I’ve been using it for a few months, and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Meier III

customer_reviews.title: Blew out immediately
customer_reviews.text: Blew out the moment I even touched the dimmer switch on my new lamp - it looks nice, but doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Cato

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light bulb and tone but I used it for 2 days and it burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I use Edison bulbs throughout my entire apartment. This one fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bulb, along with a lamp kit and wire shade, to convert a bottle from my daughter's favorite wine for her bedroom. Worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bulb
customer_reviews.text: works great and looks beautiful in my store fixture, great pricing cant beat it. I payed 20 bucks for one of these at home depot a few months ago and now that I know amazon carries them for a fraction of the price. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bahhur

customer_reviews.title: I always wanted one of these when they first came out! Love the nostalgia look!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bright light but that wasn’t the point. It’s an awesome bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Plean

customer_reviews.title: It was already blown when I got it
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the bulb was already blown. Waste of money. Not worth the hassle of returning, tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Petallic

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my new desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my new desk lamp. Just got it so have no idea how long these last. Like that its dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty and sets a fall mood since it does burn a warm orange color. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb... BAD AMAZON SUGGESTION.
customer_reviews.text: Cool bulb, but it doesn't work with the lamp suggested with it on Amazons suggestions to buy together. Luckily I bought a different bulb as well... just slightly irritating because I prefer this one and wouldn't have putchased it if it didn't work with this specific lamp. Going to just keep it and find another usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these bulbs tend to not be super bright despite their size so I wouldn't expect to ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly with the "LNC Pipe Table Lamp, Iron Plug-in Industrial lamps for living room" that I purchased. Just an FYI, these bulbs tend to not be super bright despite their size so I wouldn't expect to get these and have them work well as a stand-alone light source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good and just the right glow. Sets a warm atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Orrin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This bulb is perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp shade. This bulb is perfect for it. The 60 watt bulb was way too bright. Vintage bulb fits the style of the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken bulb....
customer_reviews.text: I received the light bulb, but unfortunately it was broken, and it is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Burned out within one day
customer_reviews.text: While it was working the bulb looked nice. However that joy lasted not even one day. The bulb is now a useless piece of junk and more hassle than it's worth to return. I would not recommend buying this low quality bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Electron

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a modern cage table lamp next to my bed and it sets off a cozy amber light perfect for curling up next to. Love it. I wouldn't recommend if you're needing a reading light, or even to use next to your laptop, however.
customer_reviews.author: Cbiv

customer_reviews.title: NIce and Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bulb to go with an Edison lamp. Came very fast for the Holiday and once plugged in is bright. Great addition for my husband's office
customer_reviews.author: January Kopek

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: These showed up broken. Also, I thought these would be clear glass but they’re definitely amber. I wish I had read the other reviews before ordering - do not order these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gelder

customer_reviews.title: Edison bulb
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and in good condition. I love this bulb and the golden light it shines in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bulb. Just look at my pic. Had an issue with shipping but they fixed it super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing - not bright
customer_reviews.text: The Bulb looks great in my vintage lamp. However, does not bring a lot of light. Can't be the only light source in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Out & Bummed Out!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a second before it burnt out. Would not recommend for $5 a bulb with no return. Will go to the big box hardware store for a similar one with a brand name.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: It came broken...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see how it would look on my lamp... and when opened it, was broken. Want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: SO VINTAGE AND CHIC
customer_reviews.text: nothing bad to say about this bulb soo cool looking get so many compliments. I stare at it all the time in amazement, medium dim so just keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: julia C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bulb design
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bulb design, though I did expect a little more brightness from the illumination. However, this light bulb is super-sleek in design and appearance. I'd recommend showing it off, on your lamp (without a shade).
customer_reviews.author: Khalid N. Hasan

customer_reviews.title: SO cool looking, but...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these bulbs! So cool looking, but I do think it’s a bit pricey for a single bulb
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous but very delicate to handle and ship. The company is great to work with and replaced both bulbs even only one was broke but even when you handle them handle carefully
customer_reviews.author: Depq49

customer_reviews.title: I love the ambiance this vintage-looking bulb gives off
customer_reviews.text: I love the ambiance this vintage-looking bulb gives off. It’s definitely a yellow light, and it’s very attractive and practical. I use it as a reading light at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: The kind of light that makes your house feel cosy
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, will probably buy few more than these, just the right light type I was after. Using it on 2 industrial style night stand lamps I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Check wattage!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but not a lot of light output. I got this bulb because of the aesthetics, not knowing how little light it would give. Bulb is great, I just need to find one with better wattage I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: These globes are soooo cool! They look great and fit into any steampunk motif. The only ting is the light is very yellow and can hurt your eyes until your eyes acclimate.
customer_reviews.author: JaGo

customer_reviews.title: Just enough light for nightstand lamp
customer_reviews.text: Soft yellow light, not jarring, fits with farmhouse style lamp
customer_reviews.author: Ruff Lyfe

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Edison lightbulb. It was exactly what I wanted. Unfortunately, it arrived broken. I'm only writing a review because the item is nonreturnable. I would have liked to have exchanged it for a functioning lightbulb, but that is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and durable. Have been using light bulb for a about 6 months and is holding up great. Love the look
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this light bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of light for a small office - especially in the pre-sunrise hours while writing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS Bulbs!!! Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bulb for Vintage style Lamps....Will keep this one on my "reorder" list!!! Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: amazon midwest fan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Lightbulb with Orange Hue
customer_reviews.text: This is great and easy to install. It leaves a little more of an orange hue than I was expecting, but it leaves my hallway looking like the farmhouse modern hallway I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Vannais

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift to my friend who has these in his kitchen. Well made and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute touch. These lights are heat lights however and attract a larg amount of heat to the lightbulb. I love them, but it is personal preference. C
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAME BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: This bulb came broken and they will not replace it for me. Don’t purchase, better off going to a real store to get one of better quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DSYJ for Antique Vintage Incandescent Edison Light Bulb, 60W 110V 2100K E26/E27 ST64 Base Squirrel Cage Filament Lamp Bulb for Home Office Fixtures, Pendant Decorative Ceiling Chandelier, Amber Warm

Hotel,cafe or other architectural lighting. Indoor and outdoor decorative lighting. Garden lighting,shop lighting,down lighting. Living lighting,dining room lighting,bedroom lighting. Ideal for illuminating homes,offices,workplaces,etc. Feature: 1. for Vintage Edison Hanging Pendant, , Antique Brass & Bronze Finish. 2. for Ecopower Industrial Edison Antique Glass 1-Light Wall Sconces Simplicity. 3.for BRAND Black Antique Rustic Metal Shade Hanging Ceiling Pendant Light Max. 4.for 5-Light Linear Pendant, Oil Rubbed Bronze & Antique Brass Finish. 5. for Antique Industrial Barn Hanging Pendant Light with Metal Dome Shade, Matte Black. 6.for Vintage Chandeliers 8-Light Kitchen Island Chandelier Lighting Rustic Pendant Lighting. 7.for Industrial Pipe Chandeliers with 1 2 5 6 10 lights and Vintage Desk Lamp Glass Shade Table Lamp.
feature_bullets: 【Specification】：Original Reproduction: 110V / 60W / ST64 / E26 or E27 Base / 2100K / Dimmable / Warm Yellow.
【MULTI-FUNCTION】:Can be dimmed by the dimmer switch, but the dimmer switch are NOT included.These Edison light bulbs have proven through testing to last 3000+ hours.

【Antique style】:These vintage Edison light bulbs are built with an attractive squirrel cage filament design.Vintage filament bulbs Spiral Globe Style,Amber glow emits from the Filament Bulb, adding a warm glow to any vintage, contemporary or steampunk décor and preserving the look, feel and style of early 1900’s light bulb.

【Application】:Suitable for Lighting Metal Lamp Guard Pendant String Lights and Vintage Lamp Holders, Industrial Wire Iron Bird Cage pendant lighting, wall sconces, indoor or outdoor home or commercial decoration, kitchen, living room, bedroom, bar, coffee shop, restaurant, etc.
【Quality Guarantee】:Any question please feel free to contact us! We will give you a satisfied solution within 24 hours.
